item.title: Why Did CarMax Stock Tumble 24% Today?
item.description: Total vehicle sales of the company fell 4.1% year-over-year in the second quarter to 338,031 units, dragging revenue by 6% to $6.59 billion.

item.title: US GDP Growth Revised Up To 3.8% In Q2 Driven By Strong Consumer Spending
item.description: Consumer spending was revised sharply higher, with personal consumption expenditures rising at a 2.5% annualized pace.
